AssociateConnectionAlias.name: AssociateConnectionAlias
AssociateConnectionAlias.description: Grants permission to associate connection aliases with directories

AssociateIpGroups.name: AssociateIpGroups
AssociateIpGroups.description: Grants permission to associate IP access control groups with directories

AuthorizeIpRules.name: AuthorizeIpRules
AuthorizeIpRules.description: Grants permission to add rules to IP access control groups

CopyWorkspaceImage.name: CopyWorkspaceImage
CopyWorkspaceImage.description: Grants permission to copy a WorkSpace image

CreateConnectionAlias.name: CreateConnectionAlias
CreateConnectionAlias.description: Grants permission to create connection aliases for use with cross-Region redirection

CreateIpGroup.name: CreateIpGroup
CreateIpGroup.description: Grants permission to create IP access control groups

CreateTags.name: CreateTags
CreateTags.description: Grants permission to create tags for WorkSpaces resources

CreateWorkspaceBundle.name: CreateWorkspaceBundle
CreateWorkspaceBundle.description: Grants permission to create a WorkSpace bundle

CreateWorkspaces.name: CreateWorkspaces
CreateWorkspaces.description: Grants permission to create one or more WorkSpaces

DeleteConnectionAlias.name: DeleteConnectionAlias
DeleteConnectionAlias.description: Grants permission to delete connection aliases

DeleteIpGroup.name: DeleteIpGroup
DeleteIpGroup.description: Grants permission to delete IP access control groups

DeleteTags.name: DeleteTags
DeleteTags.description: Grants permission to delete tags from WorkSpaces resources

DeleteWorkspaceBundle.name: DeleteWorkspaceBundle
DeleteWorkspaceBundle.description: Grants permission to delete WorkSpace bundles

DeleteWorkspaceImage.name: DeleteWorkspaceImage
DeleteWorkspaceImage.description: Grants permission to delete WorkSpace images

DeregisterWorkspaceDirectory.name: DeregisterWorkspaceDirectory
DeregisterWorkspaceDirectory.description: Grants permission to deregister directories from use with Amazon WorkSpaces

DescribeAccount.name: DescribeAccount
DescribeAccount.description:
Grants permission to retrieve the configuration of Bring Your Own License (BYOL) for
                                                WorkSpaces accounts

DescribeAccountModifications.name: DescribeAccountModifications
DescribeAccountModifications.description:
Grants permission to retrieve modifications to the configuration of Bring Your Own
                                                License (BYOL) for WorkSpaces accounts

DescribeClientProperties.name: DescribeClientProperties
DescribeClientProperties.description: Grants permission to retrieve information about WorkSpaces clients

DescribeConnectionAliasPermissions.name: DescribeConnectionAliasPermissions
DescribeConnectionAliasPermissions.description:
Grants permission to retrieve the permissions that the owners of connection aliases
                                                have granted to other AWS accounts for connection aliases

DescribeConnectionAliases.name: DescribeConnectionAliases
DescribeConnectionAliases.description:
Grants permission to retrieve a list that describes the connection aliases used for
                                                cross-Region redirection

DescribeIpGroups.name: DescribeIpGroups
DescribeIpGroups.description: Grants permission to retrieve information about IP access control groups

DescribeTags.name: DescribeTags
DescribeTags.description: Grants permission to describe the tags for WorkSpaces resources

DescribeWorkspaceBundles.name: DescribeWorkspaceBundles
DescribeWorkspaceBundles.description: Grants permission to obtain information about WorkSpace bundles

DescribeWorkspaceDirectories.name: DescribeWorkspaceDirectories
DescribeWorkspaceDirectories.description:
Grants permission to retrieve information about directories that are registered with
                                                WorkSpaces

DescribeWorkspaceImagePermissions.name: DescribeWorkspaceImagePermissions
DescribeWorkspaceImagePermissions.description: Grants permission to retrieve information about WorkSpace image permissions

DescribeWorkspaceImages.name: DescribeWorkspaceImages
DescribeWorkspaceImages.description: Grants permission to retrieve information about WorkSpace images

DescribeWorkspaceSnapshots.name: DescribeWorkspaceSnapshots
DescribeWorkspaceSnapshots.description: Grants permission to retrieve information about WorkSpace snapshots

DescribeWorkspaces.name: DescribeWorkspaces
DescribeWorkspaces.description: Grants permission to obtain information about WorkSpaces

DescribeWorkspacesConnectionStatus.name: DescribeWorkspacesConnectionStatus
DescribeWorkspacesConnectionStatus.description: Grants permission to obtain the connection status of WorkSpaces

DisassociateConnectionAlias.name: DisassociateConnectionAlias
DisassociateConnectionAlias.description: Grants permission to disassociate connection aliases from directories

DisassociateIpGroups.name: DisassociateIpGroups
DisassociateIpGroups.description: Grants permission to disassociate IP access control groups from directories

ImportWorkspaceImage.name: ImportWorkspaceImage
ImportWorkspaceImage.description: Grants permission to import Bring Your Own License (BYOL) images into Amazon WorkSpaces

ListAvailableManagementCidrRanges.name: ListAvailableManagementCidrRanges
ListAvailableManagementCidrRanges.description:
Grants permission to list the available CIDR ranges for enabling Bring Your Own License
                                                (BYOL) for WorkSpaces accounts

ModifyAccount.name: ModifyAccount
ModifyAccount.description:
Grants permission to modify the configuration of Bring Your Own License (BYOL) for
                                                WorkSpaces accounts

ModifyClientProperties.name: ModifyClientProperties
ModifyClientProperties.description: Grants permission to modify the properties of WorkSpaces clients

ModifySelfservicePermissions.name: ModifySelfservicePermissions
ModifySelfservicePermissions.description:
Grants permission to modify the self-service WorkSpace management capabilities for
                                                your users

ModifyWorkspaceAccessProperties.name: ModifyWorkspaceAccessProperties
ModifyWorkspaceAccessProperties.description:
Grants permission to specify which devices and operating systems users can use to
                                                access their WorkSpaces

ModifyWorkspaceCreationProperties.name: ModifyWorkspaceCreationProperties
ModifyWorkspaceCreationProperties.description: Grants permission to modify the default properties used to create WorkSpaces

ModifyWorkspaceProperties.name: ModifyWorkspaceProperties
ModifyWorkspaceProperties.description:
Grants permission to modify WorkSpace properties, including the running mode and the
                                                AutoStop period

ModifyWorkspaceState.name: ModifyWorkspaceState
ModifyWorkspaceState.description: Grants permission to modify the state of WorkSpaces

RegisterWorkspaceDirectory.name: RegisterWorkspaceDirectory
RegisterWorkspaceDirectory.description: Grants permission to register directories for use with Amazon WorkSpaces

RevokeIpRules.name: RevokeIpRules
RevokeIpRules.description: Grants permission to remove rules from IP access control groups

StartWorkspaces.name: StartWorkspaces
StartWorkspaces.description: Grants permission to start AutoStop WorkSpaces

StopWorkspaces.name: StopWorkspaces
StopWorkspaces.description: Grants permission to stop AutoStop WorkSpaces

UpdateConnectionAliasPermission.name: UpdateConnectionAliasPermission
UpdateConnectionAliasPermission.description: Grants permission to share or unshare connection aliases with other accounts

UpdateRulesOfIpGroup.name: UpdateRulesOfIpGroup
UpdateRulesOfIpGroup.description: Grants permission to replace rules for IP access control groups

UpdateWorkspaceBundle.name: UpdateWorkspaceBundle
UpdateWorkspaceBundle.description: Grants permission to update the WorkSpace images used in WorkSpace bundles

UpdateWorkspaceImagePermission.name: UpdateWorkspaceImagePermission
UpdateWorkspaceImagePermission.description:
Grants permission to share or unshare WorkSpace images with other accounts by specifying
                                                whether other accounts have permission to copy the image
